skip_probe.docs:
**, boolean**: Skip reading the chip ID on startup. May be required for some variants (e.g. CST816S) that do not respond to i2c commands except after touches are registered. Defaults to false.

*See also: [cst816 Touch Screen Controller](https://esphome.io/components/touchscreen/cst816.html#configuration-variables)*
